segment.target: Enables a player to search for and scan planets. The Astro Terminal lets you scan nearby space in search of planets to explore. The information contained within is strictly reserved for navigators as to keep the crew's morale up.
NERON's Core gives access to NERON projects. NERON's core is where it is possible to modify programs to improve functionality.
The bed allows you to sleep to restore :pa:. Sweet dreams!
The bed allows you to sleep to restore :pa:. Sweet dreams!

Allows the NERON admin to alter certain AI behaviours aboard the ship. During NERON's psychotherapy, its interface was opened to make it more flexible. The input-output interface remains available to a handful of people.
Allows you to calculate something... It remains to be seen what...

This fantastic coffee machine produces pure Arabica coffee at a speed approaching that of light. Unfortunately the machine has a similar energy consumption to a failing nuclear power station, and in the absence of the PILGRED reactor you'll have to make do with a cup every 24 hours. The coffee machine is man's best friend. After cats.

The combustion chamber is found in the Engine Room. This is used to supply the reactors with fuel for the journey. Fuel reserve for a diesel engine. Sublime technology with a very particular purpose. The fuel transfer channels don't work any more, the liquid must be moved from the reservoir nozzles to the combustion chamber. The designers might as well have powered it with coal...

The Command Terminal is uniquely available to the Commander. Access Forbidden. Allows the Commander to do his duty. The Piloting module contains loads of tools to make the daily running of the Daedalus simpler.

The Comms. Center allows contact to be made with distant networks. This ultra-modern Comms. Center is where research findings are analyzed, collated and combined with radar information etc. It also allows you to establish long-distance communication channels.
The CryoModule® contains the bodies of your inanimate crewmates. The Cryosleep module is where you take long sleeps. It's your responsibility never to go back there.

The doors of the Daedalus are fragile and have the infuriating habit of jamming... If you find a broken one, report it to an engineer. Whatever it's made of, regardless of its density or condition, a door always leads somewhere.

An arcade game unit fitted with toughened glass, providing the very best in metacarpal fractures Too cool! An authentic replica of the DYN-X666 machine which caused 63 deaths at Shanghai2000 in 2117. Plays Rage Storm Of Fury and Call Of Dirty at 240 FPS !!!! To be used with extreme caution.

Allows the Daedalus to proceed in the case of a PILGRED failure. There is some life left in the old diesel technology dog yet. In any case, it's the only way to get the Daedalus moving. Each reactor is capable of burning 2 units of fuel per journey.
The Fuel Tank is where the valuable fuel is stored and is also equipped with a distributor Daedalus fuel tank, operate with caution. NO SMOKING!
This device allows gravity to be artificially simulated. This makes it a lot easier for the crew to move around the ship. *And then there was weight!*
A domain reserved for a certain mustachioed celebrity. Also occasionally used for cooking. Intergalactic elite chef's post. Certain martial arts skills may be necessary.
Located in the Engine Room, the lateral reactor allows the Daedalus to turn. Let you get this good old grinder going again.
Allows traces of Mush spores to be detected in living organisms. Prototype Mush detector, originally designed by Finola then perfected during the Magellan project.
The distiller is used for manufacturing pharmaceutical products. Alas, its erratic behaviour means that the final product is of varying efficacy. Happiness dispenser approved by Albus Haxley.
NERON's Core gives access to NERON projects. NERON's Core is where it is possible to modify programs to improve functionality.
The Oxygen Tank stores the oxygen necessary for the crew to continue with their asphyxiation avoidance strategy. Daedalus oxygen reservoir, operate with caution. DO NOT EMPTY for a laugh.

The PILGRED reactor. When the Daedalus set off, these were the only means of traveling faster than the speed of light. Getting it working again could allow you to return to Sol. Tear through space-time in complete safety.
Hygiene allows you to stay healthy. Anything can happen in space, and sometimes a good shower gets you back in the game after intergalactic life throws you one curveball after another.
A superb sofa in hand-stitched Nubuck leather. Designed in Sweden but produced cheaply on Encelade. Who would have thought that a plywood structure and a few cushions could be so relaxing...
This pod contains all necessary automated medical equipment for effective healthcare. In the event of hard knocks, you should probably know where this is.
Hygiene allows you to stay healthy Anything can happen in space, and sometimes a good shower gets you back in the game after intergalactic life throws you one curveball after another.

Defense against the Hunters is a priority, comrade! Firing post for the Thingumatron 3000. Cutting-edge design with toughened glass shields and a teslatron make it a formidable weapon against the Hunters.
Allows you to take the Icarus on new adventures. The Icarus was an elite exploration vehicle... a few hundred years ago!
The jukebox is great for a little relaxation session from time to time. An awesome jukebox from back in the day. Even better, it comes preloaded with the crew's favourite tunes!

The camera is an extremely useful tool for --spying-- observing your neighbors. In the presence of a camera, **secret** and **covert** actions are revealed. When a camera is installed in a room, all logs are saved in the history and displayed publicly. The camera also logs covert and furtive activity. It doesn't work if it is in your personal inventory.
The tabulatrix allows NERON to provide you with written documents.
